Description: Calm, sea surface smooth and mirror-like.
0.1 m, scaly ripples, no foam crests.
0.1-0.5 m, small wavelets, crests glassy, no breaking.
0.5-1.0 m, large wavelets, crests beging to break, scattered whitecaps.
1.0-1.5 m, small waves, becoming longer, numerous whitecaps.
1.5-2.0 m, moderate waves, taking longer form, many whitecaps, some spray.
